mapper.insert: insert into user ( userCode, userName, userPicture, gender, phoneNumber, password, e_mail, token, createAt, updateAt) values ( #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userPicture}, #{gender}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{e_mail}, #{token}, now(), now() );
mapper.update: update user set userName = #{userName},e_mail = #{e_mail},updateAt = now() where userCode = #{userCode};
mapper.select: select * from user where userName = #{userName} and password = #{password};
mapper.update: update user set address = #{address} where userCode = #{userCode};
update user set exist = 0 where userCode = #{userCode};
